articles.title: Razer’s new Blade Pro 17 has a 300Hz display option - The Verge
articles.description: Razer has announced the 2020 version of its Blade Pro 17. The laptop comes with a 4K 120Hz touch display for creative professionals, and a 300Hz 1080p panel for gamers.

Plus, upgraded processors and graphics cards
The new Blade Pro 17 will be available later this month.
